title: Eavesdropping on Labour
itunes:title: Eavesdropping on Labour
description:
Bloomberg's UK government reporter Rob Hutton describes shouts of derision for Corbyn defenders at Labour's post-election meeting. And the Prime Minister ditches Davos, as the new administration brands itself "the people's government". But will they deliver for the North? Centre for Cities' Paul Swinney, and Subrahmaniam Krishnan-Harihara, from the Greater Manchester Chamber of Commerce discuss what the region needs most, with Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
